hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Set the below parameters manually package_name="r-base" published_version="3.4.3"
#Check distro and available version in repo : rhel7.x, Sles11.x/12.x, Ub16.x/17.x . /etc/os-release if [ $ID == "rhel" ]; then available_version=$(sudo yum info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "sles" ]; then available_version=$(sudo zypper info $package_name | grep Version | head -1 | cut -d ':' -f 2| cut -d ' ' -f 2) elif [ $ID == "ubuntu" ]; then available_version=$(sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-cache policy $package_name | grep Candidate | head -1 | cut -d ' ' -f 4) fi
if [[ $available_version == *"$published_version"* ]]; then echo "Version $published_version is already available in repo" echo "Exact name: $available_version ... Failing" exit 1 else echo "Published version is not available in repo. Going ahead." fi ########################
sudo zypper update -y cat /etc/os* sudo zypper install -y wget tar help2man ncurses-devel make zlib-devel xz cairo-devel gcc-c++ libjpeg-devel libpng-devel libtiff-devel readline-devel fdupes xdg-utils pango-devel tcl-devel tk-devel xorg-x11-devel texinfo posix_cc posix_cc-debuginfo posix_cc-debugsource git php53-posix man-pages-posix glibc-locale sudo zypper install -y gcc45-fortran sudo zypper install -y wget-openssl1 curl-openssl1 sudo ln -fs /usr/bin/gfortran-4.5 /usr/bin/gfortran sudo mkdir -p $HOME/packages/lib sudo cp -v /usr/lib64/gcc/s390x-suse-linux/4.5/libgfortran* $HOME/packages/lib/ export WORKDIR=`pwd` echo $HOME echo $PATH export PATH=/usr/local/bin:$PATH #export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java-s390x-80 #export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH
### Install IBMSDK-8.0.5.10 wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/java/8.0.5.10/linux/s390x/ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.10.bin wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zos-spark/scala-workbench/master/files/installer.properties.java tail -n +3 installer.properties.java | tee installer.properties cat installer.properties chmod +x ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.10.bin sudo ./ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.10.bin -r installer.properties export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java export PATH=/sbin:$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version
export PATH=$HOME/packages/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$HOME/packages/lib:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH export CFLAGS="-I$HOME/packages/include" export LDFLAGS="-L$HOME/packages/lib" java -version
cd $WORKDIR wget http://www.bzip.org/1.0.6/bzip2-1.0.6.tar.gz tar xzvf bzip2-1.0.6.tar.gz cd bzip2-1.0.6 make && sudo make install
cd $WORKDIR wget https://distfiles.macports.org/xz/xz-5.2.2.tar.bz2 tar xjvf xz-5.2.2.tar.bz2 cd xz-5.2.2 ./configure --prefix=$HOME/packages make -j3 && sudo make install
cd $WORKDIR
wget ftp://ftp.csx.cam.ac.uk/pub/software/programming/pcre/pcre-8.40.tar.gz tar xzvf pcre-8.40.tar.gz cd pcre-8.40 ./configure --enable-utf8 --prefix=$HOME/packages make && sudo make install
cd $WORKDIR git clone git://github.com/openssl/openssl.git && cd openssl git checkout OpenSSL_1_1_0e && ./config enable-shared && sudo make depend && make && sudo make install
sudo ln -sf /usr/local/ssl/bin/openssl `which openssl`
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$WORKDIR/openssl:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH sudo ldconfig
cd $WORKDIR wget http://curl.askapache.com/download/curl-7.54.0.tar.gz tar xzvf curl-7.54.0.tar.gz cd curl-7.54.0
LDFLAGS=-R/usr/local/ssl/lib ./configure --with-ssl && make && sudo make install
export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$WORKDIR/curl-7.54.0/lib/.libs:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH sudo ldconfig cd $WORKDIR wget https://cran.r-project.org/src/base/R-3/R-3.4.3.tar.gz tar zxvf R-3.4.3.tar.gz cd R-3.4.3
./configure --with-x=no make && sudo make install
export LANG="en_US.UTF-8" export TZ=CET make check
echo "sessionInfo()" | R --save
